definition: thousands of words (idiom); having a lot of things to say/talking nonstop

sentences.english: The words will never show. the you I've come to know.
sentences.chinese: 千言萬語無法說出我所認識的你。

sentences.english: A mental picture is worth a thousand words.
sentences.chinese: 一張腦海中的心理圖片強得過千言萬語。

sentences.english: To Chinese employers, a picture is worth a thousand-word resume.
sentences.chinese: 在中國僱主看來，一張照片比得上簡歷上的千言萬語。

sentences.english: For a moment, he withholds, mouth full of pause…
sentences.chinese: 一瞬間，他忍住口胤中的千言萬語。

sentences.english: V. endless words, is the bottom of my heart the most true blessing forever.
sentences.chinese: 訴不盡的千言萬語，永遠是心底最真的祝福。

sentences.english: Thousands of words welled up in one's heart.
As a student, I have thousands of words to say.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一名學生，我有千言萬語要說。

sentences.english: Many people are visual learners and a picture is worth a thousand words.
sentences.chinese: 許多人通過圖畫來學習，一張圖片勝過千言萬語啊。

sentences.english: As the old saying goes, a picture is worth a thousand words.
sentences.chinese: 正如老話所說的，一幅圖勝過千言萬語。

sentences.english: The life the wound left since old times, even if there is the countless words expressed with difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 人生自古傷離別，縱有千言萬語難以盡抒。

sentences.english: A picture's worth a thousand words.
No words can fully express my gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 千言萬語也表達不盡我的感激心情。

sentences.english: A card can say more than a thousand words.
sentences.chinese: 一張卡片勝過千言萬語。

sentences.english: There is an old saying that one picture means a thousand words.
sentences.chinese: 有句老話說，一張圖抵得上千言萬語。

sentences.english: For a time there are thousands and thousands of words is not started.
sentences.chinese: 一時間縱有千言萬語卻不知從和說起。

definition: lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions
one's thoughts in a whirl (idiom); confused/disconcerted/upset
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
